attributes.action: Parliament Debate on the existence & the purpose of CHEMTRAILS.
attributes.additional_details:
Chem trails can be mistaken for vapour trails omitted from aircraft.
My belief & that of thousands of like minded people is these are actually Chemtrails being sprayed across Our atmosphere.
I would like MSM to report on this phenomena and for our Parliament to hold a debate on the usage and the reasonings behind the use.
attributes.background:
Its gone on long enough and MSM should
be doing their job & reporting on this phenomenon

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament don't have the power to require the media to report on specific issues. 

We could accept a petition calling for a debate.
